name: Fishing Trouble
description:
You are in debt to a very bad mobster dude. The only way you can get out of it is to do what you do best - fish.

First press up/w to boost your launch. Then use the arrow keys / WASD to catch fish.

Once the timer runs out, you have to punch the fish to get money out of them.

Purchase upgrades in the shop to get access to better fish.

Will you be able to collect enough money in time? Only you can find out.
